body.name: GUM Super Tip Toothbrush, Soft Bristle Toothbrush for Adults with Tongue Cleaner, Compact Head, 2ct (6pk)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: GUM SUPER TIP TOOTHBRUSH : The Super Tip soft toothbrush is specifically designed to clean hard-to-reach areas of the mouth including erupted third molars (wisdom teeth) and below the gum line.
BUILT IN TONGUE CLEANER : Each of our soft toothbrushes for adults comes with a built in tongue scraper for a total mouth clean that promotes fresher breath.
CLINICALLY PROVEN DESIGN : Our adult toothbrush features trademarked Super Tip bristles that are clinically proven to clean 2.8x better along the gum line versus the leading standard toothbrush.
PACK OF 2 : Each toothbrush set includes 2 toothbrushes in a variety of fun colors. Dentists recommend you change toothbrushes every 3 months.

HEALTHY STARTS HERE : Research continues to show the connection between oral health and overall health. The GUM brand is committed to providing innovative oral care products that make between teeth cleaning accessible for everyone.
body.description: The GUM Super Tip adult toothbrush is designed to clean hard-to-reach areas in the back of the mouth where built up plaque accumulates.Each of our manual toothbrushes features Super Tip bristles, which are clinically proven to remove up to 2.8x more plaque from along the gum line and between the teeth than the leading standard bristle toothbrush. Each toothbrush comes with a built-in tongue scraper. Regular tongue cleaning is an effective way to remove buildup from the surface of the tongue to reduce bad breath and improve overall oral health.Features :Designed to access hard-to-reach back teeth including wisdom teethSoft Super Tip bristles offer superior plaque removal beneath the gum lineBuilt in tongue cleaner fights halitosis (bad breath)Compact head size Research shows that oral health and overall health are linked. At GUM, we’re committed to providing a range of toothbrushes, floss picks, and oral care products that make oral health accessible for everyone.Dental professionals recommend that you brush twice daily and replace your toothbrush every 3 months.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Since our founding in 1923, Sunstar Americas, has been a respected in the design, manufacture and distribution of breakthrough oral health care products of the highest quality. We continue to take an active role in the worldwide advancement of oral health and dental care. Dr. John O. Butler, a periodontist from Chicago, started the Company in 1923 with the introduction of a 2-row, 12 tuft, wide-handled toothbrush that answered the specific need of dental professionals for a fine quality toothbrush that met oral hygiene requirements. Toothbrushes at that time were too large and bulky to reach all the way to the back of the mouth. They were made in various shapes and sizes designed mostly for appearance rather than for any scientific reason.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Very Good Value Here on Amazon...
reviews.reviewText: I have been buying these exact toothbrushes for decades. I'm fanatical about my oral hygiene, and I replace my toothbrush every two to three months without fail. I first got this brand of toothbrush at my dentist's office as a gift with my checkup a very, very long time ago, and for ages you could only get them through a dentist's office. I noticed the great difference between the GUM brand and the drugstore brands immediately, and I was hooked! You can't go wrong with the GUM brand. They are the only toothbrushes I use. I always buy the "soft" bristle choice and I now always buy the full-sized head, though the compact heads work great as well. Before finding these offered on Amazon, I used to purchase these in bulk directly from the manufacturer for the same great price of about $1.50 per brush. It sure beats the $4.00 to $5.00 per toothbrush charged for these at retail stores. Anyway, it was time to reorder and I was totally amazed to find these offered on Amazon at such a great price. These are high quality toothbrushes, designed and engineered with your best oral health in mind. The variety of colors that come in one order is not only fun, but allows multiple family members to easily distinguish which of the four colors is theirs. Whenever I go for a dental visit, the dentist and hygienists always comment on how amazingly clean my teeth are and how very healthy my gums are. Though I am really attentive to my oral care, I always feel like these toothbrushes are an extremely helpful part of my decay-fighting arsenal. I highly recommend these toothbrushes and any toothbrushes manufactured by GUM. As an aside, these toothbrushes are such great quality that I will rarely throw one away. Once past their prime and ready for replacement, I simply disinfect the brush I'm done with and store it elsewhere for later use in household cleaning tasks. I've used them for cleaning my jewelry, detailing my car, cleaning the nooks and crannies in my bathroom or kitchen, scrubbing stains out of laundry. The list is endless, but the most important use is in keeping my smile as clean and healthy as possible. Yup, I love these toothbrushes!
